markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quick Bomber](/Feats.aspx?ID=95) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=7" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 76 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You keep your bombs in easy-to-reach pouches from which you draw without thinking. You Interact to draw a bomb, then Strike with it.
name: Quick Bomber
